sqlMap.statement:
SELECT A.ALERTKEY,A.APPLICATION_NUM,A.RULEKEY,A.PBCKEY,A.ALERT_DT,A.ORGANKEY,A.ALERTTYPE, A.OBJ_TYPE_CD,A.OBJKEY,A.OBJNAME,A.ALERT_STATUS_CD,A.TRANS_AMT,A.TRANS_NUM,A.party_num, A.ACCT_NUM,A.INVALIDATE_DT,A.DEALADVISE,A.DEAL_USR,A.DEAL_DT,A.CREATE_DT,A.CURR_CD FROM T27_alert A WHERE 1>0
A.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
A.ALERTTYPE = #alerttype#
A.OBJKEY = #objkey#
A.OBJ_TYPE_CD = #obj_type_cd#
A.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
A.ORGANKEY IN ($organstr$)
A.OBJNAME LIKE #objname#
A.ALERT_STATUS_CD in('1','4')
A.ALERT_STATUS_CD = #alert_status_cd#
A.pbckey = #pbckey#
A.APPLICATION_NUM = #application_num#
A.ALERT_DT >= #alert_dt_start:DATE#
A.ALERT_DT <= #alert_dt_end:DATE#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
ORDER BY A.OBJ_TYPE_CD
ORDER BY A.ALERT_DT
ORDER BY A.TRANS_AMT
ORDER BY A.ORGANKEY
DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t27_alert A WHERE 1>0
A.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
A.ALERTTYPE = #alerttype#
A.OBJKEY = #objkey#
A.OBJ_TYPE_CD = #obj_type_cd#
A.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
A.ORGANKEY IN ($organstr$)
A.OBJNAME LIKE #objname#
A.ALERT_STATUS_CD in('1','4')
A.ALERT_STATUS_CD = #alert_status_cd#
A.pbckey = #pbckey#
A.APPLICATION_NUM = #application_num#
A.ALERT_DT >= #alert_dt_start:DATE#
A.ALERT_DT <= #alert_dt_end:DATE#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#

SELECT A.ALERTKEY,A.OBJNAME,A.CURR_CD,A.CURR_CD,A.ALERT_DT FROM T27_alert A WHERE 1>0
A.RULEKEY = #rulekey#
A.PARTY_ID = #party_id#
A.ALERT_DT >= #alert_dt_start:DATE#
A.ALERT_DT <= #alert_dt_end:DATE#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t27_alert A WHERE 1>0
A.RULEKEY = #rulekey#
A.PARTY_ID = #party_id#
A.ALERT_DT >= #alert_dt_start:DATE#
A.ALERT_DT <= #alert_dt_end:DATE#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#

SELECT A.ALERTKEY,A.OBJNAME,A.CURR_CD,A.CURR_CD,A.ALERT_DT FROM T07_PARTY_GANZ G LEFT JOIN T27_ALERT A ON G.PARTY_ID = A.OBJKEY WHERE G.PARTY_ID = A.OBJKEY AND A.OBJ_TYPE_CD = '1' AND A.ALERT_DT <= G.INFACT_DATE AND A.ALERT_DT >= G.CREATE_DATE
G.GENZ_NO = #genz_no#
A.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
A.ALERT_DT >= #alert_dt_start:DATE#
A.ALERT_DT <= #alert_dt_end:DATE#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#

SELECT COUNT(A.ALERTKEY) FROM T07_PARTY_GANZ G LEFT JOIN T27_ALERT A ON G.PARTY_ID = A.OBJKEY WHERE G.PARTY_ID = A.OBJKEY AND A.OBJ_TYPE_CD = '1' AND A.ALERT_DT <= G.INFACT_DATE AND A.ALERT_DT >= G.CREATE_DATE
G.GENZ_NO = #genz_no#
A.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
A.ALERT_DT >= #alert_dt_start:DATE#
A.ALERT_DT <= #alert_dt_end:DATE#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
SELECT a.*,b.PBC_DES FROM T27_ALERT a ,T21_PBCRULE b WHERE a.PBCKEY = b.PBCKEY AND ALERTKEY=#value#
SELECT a.ALERTKEY,a.ALERT_DT,a.CURR_CD,a.OBJNAME FROM T27_ALERT a where a.ALERTKEY=#value#

SELECT B.ALERTKEY AS ALERTKEY, A.PARTY_ID AS OBJKEY, A.PARTY_CHN_NAME AS OBJNAME, A.PARTY_CLASS_CD AS OBJ_CLASS_CD, B.STATUS AS ALERT_PARTY_STATUS_CD FROM T47_PARTY A, T27_ALERT_PARTY B WHERE A.PARTY_ID = B.PARTY_ID
B.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
B.STATUS = #alert_party_status_cd#

SELECT B.ALERTKEY AS ALERTKEY, B.ACCT_NUM, A.CUSTOMER_ID AS OBJKEY, A.CUSTOMER_NAME AS OBJNAME, A.OP_ORG_NUM AS ORGANKEY_ACCT, A.ACCT_TYPE_CD AS ACCT_TYPE_CD, B.STATUS AS ALERT_ACCT_STATUS_CD FROM T47_AGREEMENT A, T27_ALERT_ACCT B WHERE A.ACCT_NUM = B.ACCT_NUM
B.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
B.STATUS = #alert_acct_status_cd#

SELECT B.ALERTKEY AS ALERTKEY, B.TRANSACTIONKEY, A.PARTY_CHN_NAME AS objname,a.party_id AS objkey, A.ORGANKEY AS organkey_trans, A.TX_DT, A.ACCT_NUM, A.AMT AS AMOUNT_TRANS,b.status AS alert_trans_status_cd ,a.currency_cd , A.DEBIT_CREDIT, A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG FROM T47_TRANSACTION A, T27_ALERT_TRANS B WHERE A.TRANSACTIONKEY = B.TRANSACTIONKEY
B.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
B.STATUS = #alert_trans_status_cd#

UPDATE t27_alert t SET t.ALERT_STATUS_CD = #alert_status_cd# , t.dealadvise = #dealadvise# WHERE 1>0
T.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#

UPDATE t27_alert SET ALERT_STATUS_CD=#alert_status_cd# WHERE 1>0 and ALERT_STATUS_CD='1'
rulekey=#list[]#

UPDATE t27_alert_party t SET t.status = #alert_party_status_cd# WHERE 1>0
T.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
T.party_id = #objkey#

UPDATE t27_alert_acct t SET t.status = #alert_acct_status_cd# WHERE 1>0
T.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
T.party_id = #objkey#
T.acct_num = #acct_num#

UPDATE t27_alert_trans t SET t.status = #alert_trans_status_cd# WHERE 1>0
T.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
T.party_id = #objkey#
T.acct_num = #acct_num#
T.TRANSACTIONKEY = #transactionkey#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $tablename$ WHERE status = #temp_status_cd#
ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
party_id = #objkey#
party_id = #objkey#
acct_num = #acct_num#
